Constructor Detail

Context

public Context(String aName,
               com.conceptwave.scripting.Object size)
Creates a context object. The Context object is hash map that allows to add, remove and get objects by name. The object name must be of type string. To add an object use the expression ctx.name = value (where 'ctx' is a context object); To get an object value use the expression ctx.name. To remove an object use delete ctx.name.

Parameters:
size - Optional size of the hash map. If not specified or not number the size is set to 8.
aName - - a name of a catalog context object. If null the context object can hold any values
